scripts.compile: for x in src/*/scripts/codegen.js; do $x; done && develatus-apparatus-compile src/*/**/*.sol src/*/**/**/*.sol
scripts._test: yarn compile && RPC_PORT=$(printenv RPC_PORT || printf 8222) mocha --file src/common/test/mocha.js --color --bail --exit --timeout=900000 $@
scripts.dist:node: rollup -c rollup.config.js -f es -i src/v1/lib/index.js -o dist/node.js && scripts/fixBundle.js dist/node.js
scripts.dist:txBuilder: rollup -c rollup.config.js -f es -i src/v1/lib/TransactionBuilder.js -o dist/TransactionBuilder.js && scripts/fixBundle.js dist/TransactionBuilder.js
scripts.dist:replayTool: rollup -c rollup.config.js -f es -i src/tools/replayTool.js -o dist/replayTool.js && scripts/fixBundle.js dist/replayTool.js
scripts.dist: yarn dist:node && yarn dist:txBuilder && yarn dist:replayTool
